GK16dkavy1au:9: yadi śabdā3-hvayaṃ jyotir % ā-saṃ-sāraṃ na dīpyate // 1.4 //
GK16dkavy1au:11: teṣām a-saṃ-ni-dhāne 'pi % na svayaṃ paśya naśyati // 1.5 //
GK16dkavy1au:12: gaur gauḥ kāma-dughā samyak $ pra-yuktā smaryate budhaiḥ &
GK16dkavy1au:13: duṣ-pra-yuktā punar go-tvaṃ % pra-yoktuḥ sai0va śaṃsati // 1.6 //
GK16dkavy1au:14: tad alpam api no7pe3kṣyaṃ $ kāvye duṣṭaṃ kathaṃ cana &
GK16dkavy1au:15: syād vapuḥ sundaram api % śvitreṇai8kena dur-bhagam // 1.7 //
GK16dkavy1au:20: taiḥ śarīraṃ ca kāvyānām $ alaṃ-kārāś ca darśitāḥ &
GK16dkavy1au:22: padyaṃ gadyaṃ ca miśraṃ ca $ tat tri-dhai0va vy-ava-sthitam &
GK16dkavy1au:23: padyaṃ catuṣ-padī tac ca % vṛttaṃ jātir iti dvi-dhā // 1.11 //
GK16dkavy1au:25: sā vidyā naus vivikṣūṇāṃ % gambhīraṃ kāvya-sāgaram // 1.12 //
GK16dkavy1au:26: muktakaṃ kulakaṃ kośaḥ $ saṃ-ghāta iti tā-dṛśaḥ &
GK16dkavy1au:29: āśīr namas-kriyā vastu- % nir-deśo vā9pi tan-mukham // 1.14 //
GK16dkavy1au:39: nyūnam apy atra yaiḥ-kaiś-cid $ aṅgaiḥ kāvyaṃ na duṣyati &
GK16dkavy1au:41: guṇa-taḥ prāg upa-nyasya $ nāyakaṃ tena vi-dviṣām &
GK16dkavy1au:44: taj-jayān nāyako3t-karṣa- % varṇanaṃ ca dhinoti naḥ // 1.22 //
GK16dkavy1au:46: iti tasya pra-bhedau dvau % tayor ā-khyāyikā kila // 1.23 //
GK16dkavy1au:49: api tv a-ni-yamo dṛṣṭas $ tatrā7py anyair ud-īraṇāt &
GK16dkavy1au:50: anyo vaktā svayaṃ veti % kī-dṛg vā bheda-lakṣaṇam // 1.25 //
GK16dkavy1au:51: vaktraṃ cā7para-vaktraṃ ca $ so1cchvāsa-tvaṃ ca bhedakam &
GK16dkavy1au:52: cihnam ā-khyāyikāyāś cet % pra-saṅgena kathāsv api // 1.26 //
GK16dkavy1au:54: bhedaś ca dṛṣṭo lambā3dir % uc-chvāso vā9stu kiṃ tataḥ // 1.27 //
GK16dkavy1au:60: mukham iṣṭā1rtha-saṃ-siddhyai % kiṃ hi na syāt kṛtā3tmanām // 1.30 //
GK16dkavy1au:63: tad etad vāṅ-mayaṃ bhūyaḥ $ saṃs-kṛtaṃ prā-kṛtaṃ tathā &
GK16dkavy1au:64: apa-bhraṃśaś ca miśraṃ ce7ty % āhur āryāś catur-vi-dham // 1.32 //
GK16dkavy1au:65: saṃs-kṛtaṃ nāma daivī vāg $ anv-ā-khyātā maha-rṣibhiḥ &
GK16dkavy1au:69: śaura-senī ca gauḍī ca $ lāṭī cā7nyā ca tā-dṛśī &
GK16dkavy1au:70: yāti prā-kṛtam ity evaṃ % vy-ava-hāreṣu saṃ-nidhim // 1.35 //
GK16dkavy1au:78: śravyam eve7ti sai0ṣā9pi % dvayī gatir ud-ā-hṛtā // 1.39 //
GK16dkavy1au:79: asty an-eko girāṃ mārgaḥ $ sūkṣma-bhedaḥ paras-param &
GK16dkavy1au:83: iti vaidarbha-mārgasya $ prā3ṇā daśa guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ &
GK16dkavy1au:104: madhuraṃ rasa-vad vāci $ vastuny api rasa-sthitiḥ &
GK16dkavy1au:107: yayā kayā-cic chrutyā yat $ samānam anu-bhūyate &
GK16dkavy1au:109: eṣa rājā yadā lakṣmīṃ $ prā3pta-vān brahmaṇa-priyaḥ &
GK16dkavy1au:111: itī7daṃ nā8dṛtaṃ gauḍair $ anu-prā3sas tu tat-priyaḥ &
GK16dkavy1au:112: anu-prā3sād api prā3yo % vaidarbhair idam iṣyate // 1.54 //
GK16dkavy1au:113: varṇā3vṛttir anu-prā1saḥ $ pādeṣu ca padeṣu ca &
GK16dkavy1au:117: cāru candramasaṃ bhīru $ bimbaṃ paśyai8tad ambare &
GK16dkavy1au:120: na tu rāmā-mukhā1mbho-ja- % sa-dṛśaś candramā iti // 1.58 //
GK16dkavy1au:121: smaraḥ kharaḥ khalaḥ kāntaḥ $ kāyaḥ kopaś ca naḥ kṛśaḥ &
GK16dkavy1au:122: cyuto māno 'dhiko rāgo % moho jāto 'savo gatāḥ // 1.59 //
GK16dkavy1au:123: ity ādi bandha-pāruṣyaṃ $ śaithilyaṃ ca ni-gacchati &
GK16dkavy1au:127: tat tu nai8kā3nta-madhuram % ataḥ paścād vi-dhāsyate // 1.61 //
GK16dkavy1au:129: kāmaṃ sarvo 'py alaṃ-kāro $ rasam arthe ni-ṣañcati &
GK16dkavy1au:131: kanye kāmayamānaṃ māṃ $ na tvaṃ kāmayase katham &
GK16dkavy1au:138: duṣ-pratī1ti-karaṃ grāmyaṃ % yathā yā bhavataḥ priyā // 1.66 //
GK16dkavy1au:139: kharaṃ pra-hṛtya vi-śrāntaḥ $ puruṣo vīrya-vān iti &
GK16dkavy1au:140: evam ādi na śaṃsanti % mārgayor ubhayor api // 1.67 //
GK16dkavy1au:150: dīptam ity aparair bhūmnā $ kṛcchro1dyam api badhyate &
GK16dkavy1au:151: ny-akṣeṇa kṣayitaḥ pakṣaḥ % kṣatriyāṇāṃ kṣaṇād iti // 1.72 //
GK16dkavy1au:157: ne8dṛśaṃ bahu manyate $ mārgayor ubhayor api &
GK16dkavy1au:160: ut-karṣa-vān guṇaḥ kaś-cid $ yasminn ukte pratī1yate &
GK16dkavy1au:162: arthināṃ kṛpaṇā dṛṣṭis $ tvan-mukhe patitā sa-kṛt &
GK16dkavy1au:163: tad-ava-sthā punar deva % nā7nyasya mukham īkṣate // 1.77 //
GK16dkavy1au:164: iti tyāgasya vākye 'sminn $ ut-karṣaḥ sādhu lakṣyate &
GK16dkavy1au:166: ślāghyair vi-śeṣaṇair yuktam $ ud-āraṃ kaiś-cid iṣyate &
GK16dkavy1au:175: iti padye 'pi paurastyā $ badhnanty ojas-vinīr giraḥ &
GK16dkavy1au:176: anye tv an-ā-kulaṃ hṛdyam % icchanty ojo girāṃ yathā // 1.83 //
GK16dkavy1au:177: kasya kāmā3turaṃ ceto % vāruṇī na kariṣyati // 1.84 //
GK16dkavy1au:180: tac ca vārttā2bhi-dhāneṣu % varṇanāsv api dṛśyate // 1.85 //
GK16dkavy1au:181: gṛhāṇi nāma tāny eva $ tapo-rāśir bhavā-dṛśaḥ &
GK16dkavy1au:188: yo 'rthas tenā7ti tuṣyanti % vi-dagdhā ne7tare janāḥ // 1.89 //
GK16dkavy1au:193: idam aty-uktir ity uktam $ etad gauḍo1pa-lālitam &
GK16dkavy1au:194: pra-sthānaṃ prāk-pra-ṇītaṃ tu % sāram anyasya vartmanaḥ // 1.92 //
GK16dkavy1au:197: samyag ā-dhīyate yatra % sa sam-ā-dhiḥ smṛto yathā // 1.93 //
GK16dkavy1au:203: iti hṛdyam a-hṛdyaṃ tu $ niḥ-ṣṭhīvati vadhūr iti &
GK16dkavy1au:204: yuga-pan nai3ka-dharmāṇām % adhy-āsaś ca smṛto yathā // 1.97 //
GK16dkavy1au:209: tad etat kāvya-sarva-svaṃ $ sam-ā-dhir nāma yo guṇaḥ &
GK16dkavy1au:212: tad-bhedās tu na śakyante % vaktuṃ prati-kavi sthitāḥ // 1.101 //
GK16dkavy1au:214: tathā9pi na tad ā-khyātuṃ % saras-vatyā9pi śakyate // 1.102 //
GK16dkavy1au:215: nai-sargikī ca prati-bhā $ śrutaṃ ca bahu nir-malam &
GK16dkavy1au:217: na vidyate yady api pūrva-vāsanā- $ guṇā1nu-bandhi prati-bhānam adbhutam &
GK16dkavy1au:218: śrutena yatnena ca vāg upā1sitā % dhruvaṃ karoty eva kam-apy anu-graham //
GK16dkavy1au:219: tad asta-tandrair a-niśaṃ saras-vatī $ śramād upā1syā khalu kīrtim īpsubhiḥ &
GK16dkavy1au:220: kṛśe kavi-tve 'pi janāḥ kṛta-śramāḥ % vi-dagdha-goṣṭhīṣu vi-hartum īśate
GK16dkavy1au:221: // iti kāvyā3darśe mārga-vibhāgo nāma prathamaḥ pari-cchedaḥ //
